title: Eli: Warriors For The Light
description: At a very young age the Rules of Conduct for the Fallen Angels were drummed into Eli Grigoriâ€™s head. He managed to break all of them. He falls in love with Ryden O'Sullivan, a human, his soul mate. Hashasheen demons, assassins for hire are sent to take out Eli and Ryden. With his wings bound and his magic gone, can Eli protect his love? Will any of it matter to the Watchers?
author: Karen Michelle Nutt
